00028 #define HANDLE_INT( x ) if ( status & x ) { Handle_##x(); status &= ~x; }

00046 /* Variables and prototypes for USB powerdown (suspend) functionality. */
00047 static bool UsbPowerDown( void );
00048 static bool UsbPowerUp( void );

00050 volatile bool USBD_poweredDown = false;

00052 /* Storage for backing up USB core registers. */

00054 #if defined(_USB_GOTGCTL_MASK)
00055 static uint32_t  x_USB_GOTGCTL;
00056 #endif

00090 /*
00091  * USB_IRQHandler() is the first level handler for the USB peripheral interrupt.
00092  */
00093 void USB_IRQHandler( void )
00094 {
00095   uint32_t status;
00096   bool servedVbusInterrupt = false;
00097 
00098   INT_Disable();
00099 
00100 #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE )
00101   if ( USBD_poweredDown )
00102   {
00103     /* Switch USBC clock from 32kHz to a 48MHz clock to be able to  */
00104     /* read USB peripheral registers.                               */
00105     /* If we woke up from EM2, HFCLK is now HFRCO.                  */
00106 
00107     /* Restore clock oscillators.*/
00108 #if defined( CMU_OSCENCMD_USHFRCOEN )
00109     if ( ( CMU->STATUS & CMU_STATUS_USHFRCOENS ) == 0 )/*Wakeup from EM2 ?*/
00110     {
00111       CMU->OSCENCMD = ( cmuStatus
00112                         & ( CMU_STATUS_AUXHFRCOENS | CMU_STATUS_HFXOENS ) )
00113                       | CMU_OSCENCMD_USHFRCOEN;
00114     }
00115 #else
00116     if ( ( CMU->STATUS & CMU_STATUS_HFXOENS ) == 0 ) /* Wakeup from EM2 ? */
00117     {
00118       CMU->OSCENCMD = cmuStatus
00119                       & ( CMU_STATUS_AUXHFRCOENS | CMU_STATUS_HFXOENS );
00120     }
00121 #endif
00122 
00123     /* Select correct USBC clock.*/
00124 #if defined( CMU_OSCENCMD_USHFRCOEN )
00125     CMU->CMD = CMU_CMD_USBCCLKSEL_USHFRCO;
00126     while ( ( CMU->STATUS & CMU_STATUS_USBCUSHFRCOSEL ) == 0 ){}
00127 #else
00128     CMU->CMD = CMU_CMD_USBCCLKSEL_HFCLKNODIV;
00129     while ( ( CMU->STATUS & CMU_STATUS_USBCHFCLKSEL ) == 0 ){}
00130 #endif
00131   }
00132 #endif /* if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE ) */
00133 
00134   if ( USB->IF && ( USB->CTRL & USB_CTRL_VREGOSEN ) )
00135   {
00136     if ( USB->IF & USB_IF_VREGOSH )
00137     {
00138       USB->IFC = USB_IFC_VREGOSH;
00139 
00140       if ( USB->STATUS & USB_STATUS_VREGOS )
00141       {
00142         servedVbusInterrupt = true;
00143         DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "\nVboN" );
00144 
00145 #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE )
00146         if ( UsbPowerUp() )
00147         {
00148           USBDHAL_EnableUsbResetAndSuspendInt();
00149         }
00150         USBD_SetUsbState( USBD_STATE_POWERED );
00151 #endif
00152       }
00153     }
00154 
00155     if ( USB->IF & USB_IF_VREGOSL )
00156     {
00157       USB->IFC = USB_IFC_VREGOSL;
00158 
00159       if ( ( USB->STATUS & USB_STATUS_VREGOS ) == 0 )
00160       {
00161         servedVbusInterrupt = true;
00162         DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "\nVboF" );
00163 
00164 #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE )
00165 #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE & USB_PWRSAVE_MODE_ONVBUSOFF )
00166         if ( !USBD_poweredDown )
00167         {
00168           USB->GINTMSK = 0;
00169           USB->GINTSTS = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00170         }
00171 
00172         UsbPowerDown();
00173 #endif
00174         USBD_SetUsbState( USBD_STATE_NONE );
00175 #endif
00176       }
00177     }
00178   }
00179 
00180   status = USBHAL_GetCoreInts();
00181   if ( status == 0 )
00182   {
00183     INT_Enable();
00184     if ( !servedVbusInterrupt )
00185     {
00186       DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "\nSinT" );
00187     }
00188     return;
00189   }
00190 
00191   HANDLE_INT( USB_GINTSTS_RESETDET   )
00192   HANDLE_INT( USB_GINTSTS_WKUPINT    )
00193   HANDLE_INT( USB_GINTSTS_USBSUSP    )
00194   HANDLE_INT( USB_GINTSTS_SOF        )
00195   HANDLE_INT( USB_GINTSTS_ENUMDONE   )
00196   HANDLE_INT( USB_GINTSTS_USBRST     )
00197   HANDLE_INT( USB_GINTSTS_IEPINT     )
00198   HANDLE_INT( USB_GINTSTS_OEPINT     )
00199 
00200   INT_Enable();
00201 
00202   if ( status != 0 )
00203   {
00204     DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "\nUinT" );
00205   }
00206 }
00207 
00208 /*
00209  * Handle port enumeration interrupt. This has nothing to do with normal
00210  * device enumeration.
00211  */
00212 static void Handle_USB_GINTSTS_ENUMDONE( void )
00213 {
00214 #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE )
00215   UsbPowerUp();
00216 #endif
00217 
00218   USBDHAL_Ep0Activate( dev->ep0MpsCode );
00219   dev->ep[ 0 ].state = D_EP_IDLE;
00220   USBDHAL_EnableInts( dev );
00221   DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "EnumD" );
00222 }
00223 
00224 /*
00225  * Handle IN endpoint transfer interrupt.
00226  */
00227 static void Handle_USB_GINTSTS_IEPINT( void )
00228 {
00229   int epnum;
00230   uint16_t epint;
00231   uint16_t epmask;
00232   uint32_t status;
00233   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00234 
00235   DEBUG_USB_INT_HI_PUTCHAR( 'i' );
00236 
00237   epint = USBDHAL_GetAllInEpInts();
00238   for ( epnum = 0,                epmask = 1;
00239         epnum <= MAX_NUM_IN_EPS;
00240         epnum++,                  epmask <<= 1 )
00241   {
00242     if ( epint & epmask )
00243     {
00244       ep = USBD_GetEpFromAddr( USB_SETUP_DIR_MASK | epnum );
00245       status = USBDHAL_GetInEpInts( ep );
00246 
00247       if ( status & USB_DIEP_INT_XFERCOMPL )
00248       {
00249         USB_DINEPS[ epnum ].INT = USB_DIEP_INT_XFERCOMPL;
00250 
00251         DEBUG_USB_INT_HI_PUTCHAR( 'c' );
00252 
00253         if ( epnum == 0 )
00254         {
00255           if ( ep->remaining > ep->packetSize )
00256           {
00257             ep->remaining -= ep->packetSize;
00258             ep->xferred += ep->packetSize;
00259           }
00260           else
00261           {
00262             ep->xferred += ep->remaining;
00263             ep->remaining = 0;
00264           }
00265           USBDEP_Ep0Handler( dev );
00266         }
00267         else
00268         {
00269           ep->xferred = ep->remaining -
00270                         ( ( USB_DINEPS[ epnum ].TSIZ      &
00271                             _USB_DIEP_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_MASK    ) >>
00272                           _USB_DIEP_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_SHIFT          );
00273           ep->remaining -= ep->xferred;
00274 
00275           USBDEP_EpHandler( ep->addr );
00276 #if defined( USB_DOEP0INT_STUPPKTRCVD )
00277           if ( USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].INT & USB_DIEP_INT_NAKINTRPT )
00278           {
00279             USB_DINEPS[ ep->num ].INT = USB_DIEP_INT_NAKINTRPT;
00280           }
00281 #endif
00282         }
00283       }
00284     }
00285   }
00286 }
00287 
00288 /*
00289  * Handle OUT endpoint transfer interrupt.
00290  */
00291 static void Handle_USB_GINTSTS_OEPINT( void )
00292 {
00293   int epnum;
00294   uint16_t epint;
00295   uint16_t epmask;
00296   uint32_t status;
00297   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00298 
00299   DEBUG_USB_INT_HI_PUTCHAR( 'o' );
00300 
00301   epint = USBDHAL_GetAllOutEpInts();
00302   for ( epnum = 0,                epmask = 1;
00303         epnum <= MAX_NUM_OUT_EPS;
00304         epnum++,                  epmask <<= 1 )
00305   {
00306     if ( epint & epmask )
00307     {
00308       ep = USBD_GetEpFromAddr( epnum );
00309       status = USBDHAL_GetOutEpInts( ep );
00310 
00311 #if defined( USB_DOEP0INT_STUPPKTRCVD )
00312       HandleOutEpIntr( status, ep );
00313 #else
00314       if ( status & USB_DOEP_INT_XFERCOMPL )
00315       {
00316         USB_DOUTEPS[ epnum ].INT = USB_DOEP_INT_XFERCOMPL;
00317         DEBUG_USB_INT_HI_PUTCHAR( 'c' );
00318         ProcessOepData( ep );
00319       }
00320 
00321       /* Setup Phase Done */
00322       if ( status & USB_DOEP0INT_SETUP )
00323       {
00324         ProcessSetup();
00325       }
00326 #endif
00327     }
00328   }
00329 }
00330 
00331 #if !defined( USB_DOEP0INT_STUPPKTRCVD )
00332 static void ProcessOepData( USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00333 {
00334   if ( ep->num == 0 )
00335   {
00336     if ( ep->remaining > ep->packetSize )
00337     {
00338       ep->remaining -= ep->packetSize;
00339       ep->xferred += ep->packetSize;
00340     }
00341     else
00342     {
00343       ep->xferred += ep->remaining;
00344       ep->remaining = 0;
00345     }
00346     USBDEP_Ep0Handler( dev );
00347   }
00348   else
00349   {
00350     ep->xferred = ep->hwXferSize -
00351         ( ( USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].TSIZ & _USB_DOEP_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_MASK )>>
00352           _USB_DOEP_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_SHIFT );
00353     ep->remaining -= ep->xferred;
00354     USBDEP_EpHandler( ep->addr );
00355   }
00356 }
00357 #endif
00358 
00359 #if !defined( USB_DOEP0INT_STUPPKTRCVD )
00360 static void ProcessSetup( void )
00361 {
00362   DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "\nS" );
00363 
00364   if ( USB->DOEP0INT & USB_DOEP0INT_BACK2BACKSETUP )
00365   {                           /* Back to back setup packets received */
00366     USB->DOEP0INT = USB_DOEP0INT_BACK2BACKSETUP;
00367     DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "B2B" );
00368 
00369     dev->setup = (USB_Setup_TypeDef*)( USB->DOEP0DMAADDR - USB_SETUP_PKT_SIZE );
00370   }
00371   else
00372   {
00373     /* Read SETUP packet counter from hw. */
00374     int supCnt = ( USB->DOEP0TSIZ & _USB_DOEP0TSIZ_SUPCNT_MASK )
00375                  >> _USB_DOEP0TSIZ_SUPCNT_SHIFT;
00376 
00377     if ( supCnt == 3 )
00378       supCnt = 2;
00379 
00380     dev->setup = &dev->setupPkt[ 2 - supCnt ];
00381   }
00382   USB->DOEP0TSIZ |= 3 << _USB_DOEP0TSIZ_SUPCNT_SHIFT;
00383   USB->DOEP0DMAADDR = (uint32_t)dev->setupPkt;
00384   USB->DOEP0INT = USB_DOEP0INT_SETUP;
00385 
00386   USBDEP_Ep0Handler( dev );   /* Call the SETUP handler for EP0 */
00387 }
00388 #endif
00389 
00390 /*
00391  * Handle USB reset detected interrupt in suspend mode.
00392  */
00393 static void Handle_USB_GINTSTS_RESETDET  ( void )
00394 {
00395 #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE )
00396   if ( ! USBD_poweredDown )
00397   {
00398     USB->GINTSTS = USB_GINTSTS_RESETDET;
00399   }
00400 
00401   if ( UsbPowerUp() )
00402   {
00403     USB->GINTSTS = USB_GINTSTS_RESETDET;
00404   }
00405 
00406 #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE & USB_PWRSAVE_MODE_ONVBUSOFF )
00407   /* Power down immediately if VBUS is off. */
00408   if ( ! ( USB->STATUS & USB_STATUS_VREGOS ) )
00409   {
00410     UsbPowerDown();
00411   }
00412 #endif
00413 
00414 #else
00415   USB->GINTSTS = USB_GINTSTS_RESETDET;
00416 #endif /* if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE ) */
00417 
00418   if ( USB->STATUS & USB_STATUS_VREGOS )
00419   {
00420     USBD_SetUsbState( USBD_STATE_DEFAULT );
00421   }
00422   else
00423   {
00424     USBD_SetUsbState( USBD_STATE_NONE );
00425   }
00426   DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "RsuP\n" );
00427 }
00428 
00429 /*
00430  * Handle Start Of Frame (SOF) interrupt.
00431  */
00432 static void Handle_USB_GINTSTS_SOF( void )
00433 {
00434   USB->GINTSTS = USB_GINTSTS_SOF;
00435 
00436   if ( dev->callbacks->sofInt )
00437   {
00438     dev->callbacks->sofInt(
00439       ( USB->DSTS & _USB_DSTS_SOFFN_MASK ) >> _USB_DSTS_SOFFN_SHIFT );
00440   }
00441 }
00442 
00443 /*
00444  * Handle USB port reset interrupt.
00445  */
00446 static void Handle_USB_GINTSTS_USBRST( void )
00447 {
00448   int i;
00449 
00450   DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "ReseT" );
00451 
00452   /* Clear Remote Wakeup Signalling */
00453   USB->DCTL &= ~( DCTL_WO_BITMASK | USB_DCTL_RMTWKUPSIG );
00454   USBHAL_FlushTxFifo( 0 );
00455 
00456   /* Clear pending interrupts */
00457   for ( i = 0; i <= MAX_NUM_IN_EPS; i++ )
00458   {
00459     USB_DINEPS[ i ].INT = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00460   }
00461 
00462   for ( i = 0; i <= MAX_NUM_OUT_EPS; i++ )
00463   {
00464     USB_DOUTEPS[ i ].INT = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00465   }
00466 
00467   USB->DAINTMSK = USB_DAINTMSK_INEPMSK0 | USB_DAINTMSK_OUTEPMSK0;
00468 #if defined( USB_DOEPMSK_STSPHSERCVDMSK )
00469   USB->DOEPMSK  = USB_DOEPMSK_SETUPMSK  | USB_DOEPMSK_XFERCOMPLMSK
00470                   | USB_DOEPMSK_STSPHSERCVDMSK;
00471 #else
00472   USB->DOEPMSK  = USB_DOEPMSK_SETUPMSK  | USB_DOEPMSK_XFERCOMPLMSK;
00473 #endif
00474   USB->DIEPMSK  = USB_DIEPMSK_XFERCOMPLMSK;
00475 
00476   /* Reset Device Address */
00477   USB->DCFG &= ~_USB_DCFG_DEVADDR_MASK;
00478 
00479   /* Setup EP0 to receive SETUP packets */
00480   USBDHAL_StartEp0Setup( dev );
00481   USBDHAL_EnableInts( dev );
00482 
00483   if ( dev->callbacks->usbReset )
00484   {
00485     dev->callbacks->usbReset();
00486   }
00487 
00488   USBD_SetUsbState( USBD_STATE_DEFAULT );
00489   USBDHAL_AbortAllTransfers( USB_STATUS_DEVICE_RESET );
00490 }
00491 
00492 /*
00493  * Handle USB port suspend interrupt.
00494  */
00495 static void Handle_USB_GINTSTS_USBSUSP( void )
00496 {
00497   USBD_State_TypeDef state;
00498 
00499   USB->GINTSTS = USB_GINTSTS_USBSUSP;
00500   USBDHAL_AbortAllTransfers( USB_STATUS_DEVICE_SUSPENDED );
00501   DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "\nSusP" );
00502 
00503   if ( USBD_GetUsbState() == USBD_STATE_NONE )
00504   {
00505     USBD_SetUsbState( USBD_STATE_POWERED );
00506   }
00507 
00508   state = USBD_GetUsbState();
00509   if ( ( state == USBD_STATE_POWERED    ) ||
00510        ( state == USBD_STATE_DEFAULT    ) ||
00511        ( state == USBD_STATE_ADDRESSED  ) ||
00512        ( state == USBD_STATE_CONFIGURED )    )
00513   {
00514 #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE )
00515     UsbPowerDown();
00516 #endif
00517     USBD_SetUsbState( USBD_STATE_SUSPENDED );
00518   }
00519 }
00520 
00521 /*
00522  * Handle USB port wakeup interrupt.
00523  */
00524 static void Handle_USB_GINTSTS_WKUPINT( void )
00525 {
00526 #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE )
00527   if ( ! USBD_poweredDown )
00528   {
00529     USB->GINTSTS = USB_GINTSTS_WKUPINT;
00530   }
00531 
00532   if ( UsbPowerUp() )
00533   {
00534     USB->GINTSTS = USB_GINTSTS_WKUPINT;
00535     USBDHAL_StartEp0Setup( dev );
00536     USBDHAL_Ep0Activate( dev->ep0MpsCode );
00537   }
00538 #else
00539   USB->GINTSTS = USB_GINTSTS_WKUPINT;
00540 #endif
00541 
00542   USBD_SetUsbState( dev->savedState );
00543   DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "WkuP\n" );
00544 }
00545 
00546 #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE )
00547 /*
00548  * Backup essential USB core registers, and set the core in partial powerdown
00549  * mode. Optionally prepare entry into EM2.
00550  */
00551 static bool UsbPowerDown( void )
00552 {
00553 #if ( NUM_EP_USED > 0 ) || ( FIFO_CNT > 0 )
00554   int i;
00555 #endif
00556 #if ( NUM_EP_USED > 0 )
00557   int epNum;
00558   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00559 #endif
00560 
00561   if ( !USBD_poweredDown )
00562   {
00563     USBD_poweredDown = true;
00564     DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '\\' );
00565 
00566     /* Backup USB core registers. */
00567     x_USB_GINTMSK   = USB->GINTMSK;
00568 #if defined(_USB_GOTGCTL_MASK)
00569     x_USB_GOTGCTL   = USB->GOTGCTL;
00570 #endif
00571     x_USB_GAHBCFG   = USB->GAHBCFG;
00572     x_USB_GUSBCFG   = USB->GUSBCFG;
00573     x_USB_GRXFSIZ   = USB->GRXFSIZ;
00574     x_USB_GNPTXFSIZ = USB->GNPTXFSIZ;
00575     x_USB_DCFG      = USB->DCFG;
00576     x_USB_DCTL      = USB->DCTL;
00577     x_USB_DAINTMSK  = USB->DAINTMSK;
00578     x_USB_DIEPMSK   = USB->DIEPMSK;
00579     x_USB_DOEPMSK   = USB->DOEPMSK;
00580     x_USB_PCGCCTL   = USB->PCGCCTL;
00581 
00582 #if ( NUM_EP_USED > 0 )
00583     for ( i = 0; i < NUM_EP_USED; i++ )
00584     {
00585       ep = &dev->ep[ i+1 ];
00586       epNum = ep->num;
00587       if ( ep->in )
00588       {
00589         x_USB_EP_CTL[     i ] = USB_DINEPS[ epNum ].CTL;
00590         x_USB_EP_TSIZ[    i ] = USB_DINEPS[ epNum ].TSIZ;
00591         x_USB_EP_DMAADDR[ i ] = USB_DINEPS[ epNum ].DMAADDR;
00592       }
00593       else
00594       {
00595         x_USB_EP_CTL[     i ] = USB_DOUTEPS[ epNum ].CTL;
00596         x_USB_EP_TSIZ[    i ] = USB_DOUTEPS[ epNum ].TSIZ;
00597         x_USB_EP_DMAADDR[ i ] = USB_DOUTEPS[ epNum ].DMAADDR;
00598       }
00599     }
00600 #endif
00601 
00602 #if ( FIFO_CNT > 0 )
00603     for ( i = 0; i < FIFO_CNT; i++ )
00604     {
00605       x_USB_DIEPTXFS[ i ] = USB_DIEPTXFS[ i ];
00606     }
00607 #endif
00608 
00609     /* Prepare for wakeup on resume and reset. */
00610     USB->DCFG    = (USB->DCFG & ~_USB_DCFG_RESVALID_MASK) |
00611                    (4 << _USB_DCFG_RESVALID_SHIFT);
00612     USB->DCFG   |= USB_DCFG_ENA32KHZSUSP;
00613     USB->GINTMSK = USB_GINTMSK_RESETDETMSK | USB_GINTMSK_WKUPINTMSK;
00614 
00615     /* Enter partial powerdown mode. */
00616     USB->PCGCCTL |= USB_PCGCCTL_PWRCLMP;
00617     USB->PCGCCTL |= USB_PCGCCTL_RSTPDWNMODULE;
00618     USB->PCGCCTL |= USB_PCGCCTL_STOPPCLK;
00619 
00620     /* Record current clock settings. */
00621     cmuStatus = CMU->STATUS;
00622 
00623 #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE & USB_PWRSAVE_MODE_ENTEREM2 )
00624     /* Enter EM2 on interrupt exit. */
00625     SCB->SCR |= SCB_SCR_SLEEPDEEP_Msk | SCB_SCR_SLEEPONEXIT_Msk;
00626 #endif
00627 
00628     /* Switch USBC clock to 32 kHz. */
00629 #if ( USB_USBC_32kHz_CLK == USB_USBC_32kHz_CLK_LFXO )
00630     CMU->CMD = CMU_CMD_USBCCLKSEL_LFXO;
00631     while ( ( CMU->STATUS & CMU_STATUS_USBCLFXOSEL ) == 0 ){}
00632 #else
00633     CMU->CMD = CMU_CMD_USBCCLKSEL_LFRCO;
00634     while ( ( CMU->STATUS & CMU_STATUS_USBCLFRCOSEL ) == 0 ){}
00635 #endif
00636 
00637     return true;
00638   }
00639   return false;
00640 }
00641 #endif /* if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE ) */
00642 
00643 #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE )
00644 /*
00645  * Exit USB core partial powerdown mode, restore essential USB core registers.
00646  * Will prevent re-entry back to EM2.
00647  * Returns true if a powerup sequence was performed.
00648  */
00649 static bool UsbPowerUp( void )
00650 {
00651 #if ( NUM_EP_USED > 0 ) || ( FIFO_CNT > 0 )
00652   int i;
00653 #endif
00654 #if ( NUM_EP_USED > 0 )
00655   int epNum;
00656   uint32_t tmp;
00657   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00658 #endif
00659 
00660   if ( USBD_poweredDown )
00661   {
00662     USBD_poweredDown = false;
00663     DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '/' );
00664 
00665 #if !defined( USB_CORECLK_HFRCO ) || !defined( CMU_OSCENCMD_USHFRCOEN )
00666     /* Switch HFCLK from HFRCO to HFXO. */
00667     CMU_ClockSelectSet( cmuClock_HF, cmuSelect_HFXO );
00668 #endif
00669 
00670     /* Turn off HFRCO when not needed. */
00671     if ( ( cmuStatus & CMU_STATUS_HFRCOENS ) == 0 )
00672     {
00673       CMU->OSCENCMD = CMU_OSCENCMD_HFRCODIS;
00674     }
00675 
00676     /* Exit partial powerdown mode. */
00677     USB->PCGCCTL &= ~USB_PCGCCTL_STOPPCLK;
00678     USB->PCGCCTL &= ~(USB_PCGCCTL_PWRCLMP | USB_PCGCCTL_RSTPDWNMODULE);
00679 
00680     if (( USB->GINTSTS & ( USB_GINTSTS_WKUPINT | USB_GINTSTS_RESETDET ) ) == 0)
00681     {
00682       USB->DCTL = x_USB_DCTL | USB_DCTL_RMTWKUPSIG;
00683       USB->DCTL = x_USB_DCTL;
00684     }
00685 
00686     /* Restore USB core registers. */
00687     USB->GUSBCFG = x_USB_GUSBCFG;
00688     USB->DCFG    = x_USB_DCFG;
00689 
00690 #if ( FIFO_CNT > 0 )
00691     for ( i = 0; i < FIFO_CNT; i++ )
00692     {
00693       USB_DIEPTXFS[ i ] = x_USB_DIEPTXFS[ i ];
00694     }
00695 #endif
00696 
00697 #if ( NUM_EP_USED > 0 )
00698     for ( i = 0; i < NUM_EP_USED; i++ )
00699     {
00700       ep = &dev->ep[ i+1 ];
00701       epNum = ep->num;
00702 
00703       tmp = x_USB_EP_CTL[ i ] &
00704             ~( USB_DIEP_CTL_CNAK       | USB_DIEP_CTL_SNAK       |
00705                USB_DIEP_CTL_SETD0PIDEF | USB_DIEP_CTL_SETD1PIDOF   );
00706 
00707       if ( x_USB_EP_CTL[ i ] & USB_DIEP_CTL_DPIDEOF )
00708         tmp |= USB_DIEP_CTL_SETD1PIDOF;
00709       else
00710         tmp |= USB_DIEP_CTL_SETD0PIDEF;
00711 
00712       if ( x_USB_EP_CTL[ i ] & USB_DIEP_CTL_NAKSTS )
00713         tmp |= USB_DIEP_CTL_SNAK;
00714       else
00715         tmp |= USB_DIEP_CTL_CNAK;
00716 
00717       if ( ep->in )
00718       {
00719         USB_DINEPS[ epNum ].CTL     = tmp;
00720         USB_DINEPS[ epNum ].TSIZ    = x_USB_EP_TSIZ[    i ];
00721         USB_DINEPS[ epNum ].DMAADDR = x_USB_EP_DMAADDR[ i ];
00722       }
00723       else
00724       {
00725         USB_DOUTEPS[ epNum ].CTL     = tmp;
00726         USB_DOUTEPS[ epNum ].TSIZ    = x_USB_EP_TSIZ[    i ];
00727         USB_DOUTEPS[ epNum ].DMAADDR = x_USB_EP_DMAADDR[ i ];
00728       }
00729     }
00730 #endif
00731 
00732     USB->PCGCCTL   = x_USB_PCGCCTL;
00733     USB->DOEPMSK   = x_USB_DOEPMSK;
00734     USB->DIEPMSK   = x_USB_DIEPMSK;
00735     USB->DAINTMSK  = x_USB_DAINTMSK;
00736     USB->DCTL      = x_USB_DCTL;
00737     USB->GNPTXFSIZ = x_USB_GNPTXFSIZ;
00738     USB->GRXFSIZ   = x_USB_GRXFSIZ;
00739     USB->GAHBCFG   = x_USB_GAHBCFG;
00740 #if defined(_USB_GOTGCTL_MASK)
00741     USB->GOTGCTL   = x_USB_GOTGCTL;
00742 #endif
00743     USB->GINTMSK   = x_USB_GINTMSK;
00744 
00745     USB->DCTL |= USB_DCTL_PWRONPRGDONE;
00746 
00747 #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE & USB_PWRSAVE_MODE_ENTEREM2 )
00748     /* Do not reenter EM2 on interrupt exit. */
00749     SCB->SCR &= ~(SCB_SCR_SLEEPDEEP_Msk | SCB_SCR_SLEEPONEXIT_Msk);
00750 #endif
00751 
00752     return true;
00753   }
00754   return false;
00755 }
00756 #endif /* if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE ) */
00757 
00758 #if defined( USB_DOEP0INT_STUPPKTRCVD )
00759 static void HandleOutEpIntr( uint32_t status, USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00760 {
00761   uint32_t doeptsiz;
00762 
00763   if ( ep->num == 0 )
00764   {
00765     if ( status & USB_DOEP0INT_XFERCOMPL )
00766     {
00767       USB->DOEP0INT = USB_DOEP0INT_XFERCOMPL;
00768       doeptsiz      = USB->DOEP0TSIZ;
00769 
00770       if ( ep->state == D_EP_IDLE )
00771       {
00772         if ( status & USB_DOEP0INT_STUPPKTRCVD )
00773         {
00774           USB->DOEP0INT = USB_DOEP0INT_STUPPKTRCVD;
00775         }
00776         status = USBDHAL_GetOutEpInts( ep );
00777         doeptsiz = USB->DOEP0TSIZ;
00778 
00779         if ( status & USB_DOEP0INT_SETUP )
00780         {
00781 retry:
00782           /* Already started data stage, clear setup */
00783           USB->DOEP0INT = USB_DOEP0INT_SETUP;
00784           status       &= ~USB_DOEP0INT_SETUP;
00785           {
00786             int supCnt = ( doeptsiz & _USB_DOEP0TSIZ_SUPCNT_MASK )
00787                          >> _USB_DOEP0TSIZ_SUPCNT_SHIFT;
00788 
00789             if ( supCnt == 3 )
00790               supCnt = 2;
00791 
00792             dev->setup = &dev->setupPkt[ 2 - supCnt ];
00793           }
00794           DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "\nS" );
00795           USBDEP_Ep0Handler( dev );
00796 
00797           /* Prepare for more setup packets */
00798           if ( ep->state == D_EP0_IN_STATUS || ep->state == D_EP_TRANSMITTING )
00799           {
00800             USBDHAL_StartEp0Setup( dev );
00801           }
00802         }
00803         else /* xfercompl && idle && !setup */
00804         {
00805             status = USBDHAL_GetOutEpInts( ep );
00806             if ( status & USB_DOEP0INT_SETUP )
00807               goto retry;
00808             USBDHAL_StartEp0Setup( dev );
00809         }
00810       }
00811       else /* ep0state != EP0_IDLE */
00812       {
00813         if ( ep->state == D_EP_RECEIVING )
00814         {
00815           if ( ep->remaining > ep->packetSize )
00816           {
00817             ep->remaining -= ep->packetSize;
00818             ep->xferred += ep->packetSize;
00819           }
00820           else
00821           {
00822             ep->xferred += ep->remaining;
00823             ep->remaining = 0;
00824           }
00825           USBDEP_Ep0Handler( dev );
00826         }
00827         else if ( ep->state == D_EP0_OUT_STATUS )
00828         {
00829           USBDEP_Ep0Handler( dev );
00830         }
00831       }
00832     } /* if ( status & USB_DOEP0INT_XFERCOMPL ) */
00833 
00834     if ( status & USB_DOEP0INT_STSPHSERCVD )
00835     {
00836       USB->DOEP0INT = USB_DOEP0INT_STSPHSERCVD;
00837     }
00838 
00839     if ( status & USB_DOEP0INT_SETUP )
00840     {
00841       USB->DOEP0INT = USB_DOEP0INT_SETUP;
00842       {
00843         int supCnt = ( USB->DOEP0TSIZ & _USB_DOEP0TSIZ_SUPCNT_MASK )
00844                      >> _USB_DOEP0TSIZ_SUPCNT_SHIFT;
00845 
00846         if ( supCnt == 3 )
00847           supCnt = 2;
00848 
00849         dev->setup = &dev->setupPkt[ 2 - supCnt ];
00850       }
00851       DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTS( "\nS" );
00852       USBDEP_Ep0Handler( dev );
00853     }
00854   }
00855   else /* epnum != 0 */
00856   {
00857     if ( status & USB_DOEP_INT_XFERCOMPL )
00858     {
00859       USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].INT = USB_DOEP_INT_XFERCOMPL;
00860 
00861       ep->xferred = ep->hwXferSize -
00862           ( ( USB_DOUTEPS[ ep->num ].TSIZ & _USB_DOEP_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_MASK )>>
00863             _USB_DOEP_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_SHIFT );
00864       ep->remaining -= ep->xferred;
00865 
00866       USBDEP_EpHandler( ep->addr );
00867     }
00868   }
00869 }
00870 #endif
00871 
00874 #endif /* defined( USB_DEVICE ) */
00875 #endif /* defined( USB_PRESENT ) && ( USB_COUNT == 1 ) */
Generated on Thu May 28 06:15:16 2015 for Silicon Labs EFM32 USB Stack by  1.6.3
